title: The Jackbox Party Pack 2
notes: Steam shows Overwhelmingly Positive (95% of 1,405). Metacritic metascore 71 with user score 6.9; blended to high-80s.
raw_comment: Five party games where you use phones, tablets or computers as controllers. Fibbage 2 (2-8 players), Earwax (3-8 players), Bidiots (3-6 players), Quiplash XL (3-8 players), Bomb Corp. (1-4 players).
